name: Drink 'n' Draw
description: Draw, scribble, doodle, sketch and drink!  Suggested donation of £3 to cover materials, spaces limited, first come, first served. Materials are provided and beginners are welcome.

location.address: Tobacco Factory, Raleigh Rd, Bristol, BS3 1TF
location.details: The Tobacco Factory, the drawing group is located in the Snug. See the website for more details.

cost.details: Suggested donation £3 to cover the cost of materials.
